item.title: Fly tipping by tenants who hav vacated a rental property, 10th September
item.description:
Personal effects dumped on the pavement when tenants moved out of a rental property yesterday.On corner of Capel close and on Green Road N20 0QT.Causing an obstruction on the pavement which could pose a risk to a visually impaired person or a wheelchair user forcing them to go into the road to get around it.

item.title: Fire and Safety Hazard - Bikes blocking exit and pathway, 10th September
item.description:
This is as you leave Benthal Court into the courtyard area. Not safe and imposes a risk to others, wheelchairs or those with mobility issues cant get through in an emergency- has been here for years. Please remove asap.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Evering Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household waste dumped, 10th September
item.description:
Household waste is regularly (several times a week) dumped across where bullbanks road and lower road meet. This is an ongoing issue likely to be household waste that isn't put into bins meaning that animals often rip bags and waste including food is often spread across entire road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bullbanks Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal parking reservation, 10th September
item.description:
The builder working on refurbishing this building paid for a parking suspension for 1+ months and subsequent to that ending have used bollards every night and during the day to essentially suspend parking without permission! They are blocking 2 parking spots which would normally be available for residents. I have asked them politely to stop this but they continue to do it. If they need to reserve this space then they should pay for an official parking suspension... I hope something can be done about this as we have limited parking spaces on this road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Palace Court, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping in car park off mill road/oak road, 10th September
item.description:
Its been reported that there is a homeless person sleeping in an abandoned building (6 mill road) and is causing a lot of flytipping in the car park behind the houses in mill road off oak road. Can someone please go down to take a look at the rubbish thats accumulating as residents are concerned this may cause vermin
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oak Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
